languages.text: {n}Закрыв глаза, Джай произносит с такой серьезностью, словно творит заклинание:{/n} "В конце они умерли, потому что все умирают. Но до того Великий даровал им милость не разу не пожалеть о чувстве, что связало их. И им было довольно этой милости".

{n}Closing her eyes, Jae speaks gravely as though casting a spell:{/n} "In the end, they died, because everyone dies. But until that time, the Exalted One granted them the mercy of never once regretting the love that bound them together. And with that mercy they were satisfied."
languages.original_text: {n}Закрыв глаза, Джай произносит с такой серьезностью, словно творит заклинание:{/n} "В конце они умерли, потому что все умирают. Но до того Великий даровал им милость не разу не пожалеть о чувстве, что связало их. И им было довольно этой милости".

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊闭上了眼睛，以吟唱般的严肃口吻开了口。{/n}“到最后，他们死了，因为每个人都会死。但在死之前，至高无上的神皇仁慈地对待他们，让他们从来没为这份爱情而后悔。有了这样的仁慈，他们死得心满意足。”
languages.original_text: {n}Closing her eyes, Jae speaks gravely as though casting a spell:{/n} "In the end, they died, because everyone dies. But until that time, the Exalted One granted them the mercy of never once regretting the love that bound them together. And with that mercy they were satisfied."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊闭上了眼睛，以吟唱般的严肃口吻开了口。{/n}“到最后，他们死了，因为每个人都会死。但在死之前，至高无上的神皇仁慈地对待他们，让他们从来没为这份爱情而后悔。有了这样的仁慈，他们死得心满意足。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}目を閉じて、ジェイは呪文を唱えるように重々しく口を開いた。{/n}「彼らは最後には死ぬ。結局、誰もが死ぬのだから。でも、その時まで、エグザルテッド・ワンは、二人を結びつけた愛を一度も後悔することのない慈悲を与えた。その慈悲によって、彼らは満たされた」
languages.original_text: {n}Closing her eyes, Jae speaks gravely as though casting a spell:{/n} "In the end, they died, because everyone dies. But until that time, the Exalted One granted them the mercy of never once regretting the love that bound them together. And with that mercy they were satisfied."

traits.locale_text: {n}目を閉じて、ジェイは呪文を唱えるように重々しく口を開いた。{/n}「彼らは最後には死ぬ。結局、誰もが死ぬのだから。でも、その時まで、エグザルテッド・ワンは、二人を結びつけた愛を一度も後悔することのない慈悲を与えた。その慈悲によって、彼らは満たされた」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae cierra los ojos y habla en tono solemne, como si lanzara un hechizo:{/n} «Al final murieron, porque a todos nos llega la hora, pero hasta entonces el Exaltado les concedió una merced: no arrepentirse nunca del amor que les unía. Y con esa merced fue más que suficiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Closing her eyes, Jae speaks gravely as though casting a spell:{/n} "In the end, they died, because everyone dies. But until that time, the Exalted One granted them the mercy of never once regretting the love that bound them together. And with that mercy they were satisfied."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae cierra los ojos y habla en tono solemne, como si lanzara un hechizo:{/n} «Al final murieron, porque a todos nos llega la hora, pero hasta entonces el Exaltado les concedió una merced: no arrepentirse nunca del amor que les unía. Y con esa merced fue más que suficiente».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae ferme les yeux et se met à parler sur un ton grave, comme si elle lançait un sort :{/n} « {mf|Ils|Elles} ont fini par mourir, comme tout le monde. Mais avant ça, l'Exalté leur a accordé la grâce de ne jamais regretter l'amour qui les unissait, et cette grâce fut pour {mf|eux|elles} une source de grande satisfaction. »
languages.original_text: {n}Closing her eyes, Jae speaks gravely as though casting a spell:{/n} "In the end, they died, because everyone dies. But until that time, the Exalted One granted them the mercy of never once regretting the love that bound them together. And with that mercy they were satisfied."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae ferme les yeux et se met à parler sur un ton grave, comme si elle lançait un sort :{/n} « {mf|Ils|Elles} ont fini par mourir, comme tout le monde. Mais avant ça, l'Exalté leur a accordé la grâce de ne jamais regretter l'amour qui les unissait, et cette grâce fut pour {mf|eux|elles} une source de grande satisfaction. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae schließt die Augen und spricht mit ernster Stimme, so als würde sie einen Zauber wirken:{/n} "Am Ende starben sie, weil jeder am Ende stirbt. Aber bis dahin gewährte ihnen der Erhabene die Gnade, ihre geteilte Liebe nicht ein einziges Mal zu bereuen. Und mit dieser Gnade waren sie glücklich."
languages.original_text: {n}Closing her eyes, Jae speaks gravely as though casting a spell:{/n} "In the end, they died, because everyone dies. But until that time, the Exalted One granted them the mercy of never once regretting the love that bound them together. And with that mercy they were satisfied."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae schließt die Augen und spricht mit ernster Stimme, so als würde sie einen Zauber wirken:{/n} "Am Ende starben sie, weil jeder am Ende stirbt. Aber bis dahin gewährte ihnen der Erhabene die Gnade, ihre geteilte Liebe nicht ein einziges Mal zu bereuen. Und mit dieser Gnade waren sie glücklich."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Closing her eyes, Jae speaks gravely as though casting a spell:{/n} "In the end, they died, because everyone dies. But until that time, the Exalted One granted them the mercy of never once regretting the love that bound them together. And with that mercy they were satisfied."

languages.text: {n}Jae, gözlerini kapayıp büyü yapar gibi derinden konuşuyor.{/n} "Nihayetinde öldüler. Çünkü herkes ölür. Fakat o gün gelene dek Görkemli onlara, onları bir araya getiren aşktan bir an olsun pişman olmama merhametini bahşetti. Bu merhamet, onlar için tatmin ediciydi."
languages.original_text: {n}Closing her eyes, Jae speaks gravely as though casting a spell:{/n} "In the end, they died, because everyone dies. But until that time, the Exalted One granted them the mercy of never once regretting the love that bound them together. And with that mercy they were satisfied."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae gözlerini kapıyor ve bir büyü yapar gibi derinden konuşuyor:{/n} "Nihayetinde öldüler. Çünkü herkes ölür. Ama o gün gelene kadar Görkemli onlara, onları bir araya getiren aşktan bir an olsun pişman olmama merhametini bahşetti. Ve bu merhamet onlar için tatmin ediciydi."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
